sentences.pinyin: tā zhàn zài chē de gēn qián.
sentences.translation: He is standing in front of the car.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在比赛的跟前，他感到紧张和兴奋。
sentences.traditionalText: 在比賽的跟前，他感到緊張和興奮。
sentences.pinyin: zài bǐsài de gēn qián, tā gǎndào jǐnzhāng hé xīngfèn.
sentences.translation: In front of the match, he feels nervous and excited.

sentences.simplifiedText: 你不要在他跟前说这个。
sentences.traditionalText: 你不要在他跟前說這個。
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ bùyào zài tā gēn qián shuō zhège.
sentences.translation: Don't say this in front of him.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我不愿意跟前的人说出我的烦恼。
sentences.traditionalText: 我不願意跟前的人說出我的煩惱。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ bù yuànyì gēn qián de rén shuō chū wǒ de fánnǎo.
sentences.translation: I don't want to voice my troubles to the people in front of me.
